alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Magoffin; Morgan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:28PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Morgan, northwestern Johnson and north central Magoffin Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 127 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Liberty, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elamton, Matthew and Elkfork around 135 PM EDT. Dingus, Logville, Haleburg, 0Jeptha, Orient, Cisco, Crockett and Bloomington around 140 PM EDT. Silverhill, Grayfox, Mima, Ever, Plutarch, Coon, Tella, Moon and Licksburg around 145 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ophir, Minefork, Lacey, Quod, Flat Fork, Wheelersburg, Relief, Leatha, Gillem Branch, Perlie, Win, Hargis, Elna, Redbush, Barnrock, Brownlow and Falcon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
